titles.title: Congratulating the Las Vegas Aces for winning the 2023 Women's National Basketball Association Finals.
Congratulating the Las Vegas Aces for winning the 2023 Women's National Basketball Association Finals.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Accountability.

bill.summary: This resolution congratulates the Las Vegas Aces on their 2023 Women's National Basketball Association Finals victory.
